beamOpeningHalfAngle.caption: Beam Opening Half Angle (mrad)
beamOpeningHalfAngle.helptext: This parameter specifies the opening half angle of the STEM beam in millirad.

useAutomaticFocusComputation.caption: Automatic Focus Computation
useAutomaticFocusComputation.helptext: If checked, the system will automatically compute the focal distance for a combined tilt- and focal series.
